name: The Power of Three
description:
(SOUND REQUIRED FOR IT TO MAKE SENSE)

Play as a music producer who has to put together "Power Trio" bands, containing a drummer, a guitarist, and a bassist. Here's the catch: who plays what? Can you make amazing music or extraordinary catastrophes? Listen to how the musicians describe their music to get hints at their role in the power trio, or if you are an actual music nerd just go by the musician's name. 

I'm...I'm not sure what to make of this one. 

Attributions

  • Writing
    • Drummer quotes adapted from https://www.rollingstone.com/music/music-lists/100-greatest-drummers-of-all-time...
    • Guitarist quotes adapted from https://www.rollingstone.com/music/music-lists/100-greatest-guitarists-153675/
    • Bassist quotes adapted from https://www.rollingstone.com/music/music-lists/50-greatest-bassists-of-all-time-...
    • Band Names selected from https://www.kaggle.com/code/rtatman/are-band-names-more-surprising-than-song-tit...
  • Art
    • Trees from https://opengameart.org/content/two-pixelish-tree-sprites
    • Birds from https://opengameart.org/content/winter-birds
    • Drums from https://openclipart.org/image/400px/1017
    • Guitar from https://openclipart.org/image/400px/23984
    • Bass from https://openclipart.org/image/400px/241584
  • Sound
    • Bird chirping noise from https://opengameart.org/content/peacock-chirp

Created with

  • Programmed with Unity 2020.3.31f1
  • "Music" created with FLStudio 20
  • 5 hours of going through quotes about musicians
  • 4-5 hours of programming time
  • 30 minutes of music creation time
  • Github Repository Here: https://github.com/heyacfox/LEGJ-Submissions/tree/main/ThePowerOfThree
